## TemporalRangesTariffSchedule class

A schedule, or collection, of [TemporalRangesTariff](./nifty-tou.temporalrangestariff.md) rules that supports resolving rates for dates.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export default class TemporalRangesTariffSchedule<T extends TemporalRangesTariff, O extends TemporalRangesTariffScheduleOptions> 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(rules, options)](./nifty-tou.temporalrangestariffschedule._constructor_.md) |  | Constructor. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [multipleMatch](./nifty-tou.temporalrangestariffschedule.multiplematch.md) | <code>readonly</code> | boolean | Get the multiple-match mode. |
|  [options](./nifty-tou.temporalrangestariffschedule.options.md) | <code>readonly</code> | O \| undefined | Get the options. |
|  [rules](./nifty-tou.temporalrangestariffschedule.rules.md) | <code>readonly</code> | readonly T\[\] | Get the rules. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [firstMatch(date, utc)](./nifty-tou.temporalrangestariffschedule.firstmatch.md) |  | Find the first rule that applies on a given date. |
|  [matches(date, utc)](./nifty-tou.temporalrangestariffschedule.matches.md) |  | Find the rules that apply on a given date, repsecting the <code>multipleMatch</code> property. |
|  [resolve(date, utc)](./nifty-tou.temporalrangestariffschedule.resolve.md) |  | <p>Resolve the tariff rates that apply on a given date, respecting the <code>multipleMatch</code> property.</p><p>Duplicate rate <code>id</code> values will override existing rates, so that the last-seen rate for a given <code>id</code> is the one returned.</p> |
